chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (f1 f2 : R -> R -> R) (x y lx ly : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f1 u v = f2 u v) x y -> differentiable_pt_lim f1 x y lx ly -> differentiable_pt_lim f2 x y lx ly

Premises:
differentiable_pt_lim = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y lx ly : R) => forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x y - (lx * (u - x) + ly * (v - y))) <= eps * Rmax (Rabs (u - x)) (Rabs (v - y))) x y : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope]
locally_2d = fun (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R) => exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> P u v : (R -> R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
ClassicalFacts.f1 : forall A B : Prop, ClassicalFacts.retract A B -> A -> B
ClassicalFacts.f2 : forall A B : Prop, ClassicalFacts.retract A B -> B -> A
*** [ R : Set ]
filterdiff_differentiable_pt_lim : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y lx ly : R), filterdiff (fun u : R * R => f (fst u) (snd u)) (locally (x, y)) (fun u : R * R => fst u * lx + snd u * ly) < -> differentiable_pt_lim f x y lx ly
locally_2d_impl : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_2d_impl_strong : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => locally_2d P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
locally_2d_and : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => P u v /\ Q u v) x y
continuity_2d_pt_ext_loc : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v = g u v) x y -> continuity_2d_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt g x y
continuity_2d_pt_neq_0 : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), continuity_2d_pt f x y -> f x y <> 0 -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v <> 0) x y
locally_2d_forall : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall u v : R, P u v) -> locally_2d P x y
derivable_pt_div : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R), derivable_pt f1 x -> derivable_pt f2 x -> f2 x <> 0 -> derivable_pt (f1 / f2) x
derivable_pt_lim_div : forall (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x l1 l2 : R), derivable_pt_lim f1 x l1 -> derivable_pt_lim f2 x l2 -> f2 x <> 0 -> derivable_pt_lim (f1 / f2) x ((l1 * f2 x - l2 * f1 x) / (f2 x)²)
locally_2d_align : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall eps : posreal, (forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> P u v) -> forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> Q u v) -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
continuity_2d_pt = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x y) < eps) x y : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
div_fct = fun (f1 f2 : R -> R) (x : R) => f1 x / f2 x : (R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope Rfun_scope R_scope]
locally_2d_1d : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => forall t : R, 0 <= t <= 1 -> locally_2d P (x + t * (u - x)) (y + t * (v - y))) x y
formule : forall (x h l1 l2 : R) (f1 f2 : R -> R), h <> 0 -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (f1 (x + h) / f2 (x + h) - f1 x / f2 x) / h - (l1 * f2 x - l2 * f1 x) / (f2 x)² = / f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1) + l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h)) - f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2) + l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)
locally_2d_1d_strong : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d (fun u v : R => forall t : R, 0 <= t <= 1 -> locally t (fun z : R_UniformSpace => locally_2d P (x + z * (u - x)) (y + z * (v - y)))) x y
locally_2d_ex_dec : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall x0 y0 : R, P x0 y0 \/ ~ P x0 y0) -> locally_2d P x y -> {d : posreal | forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < d -> Rabs (v - y) < d -> P u v}
maj_term4 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 alp_f2c : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2c -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * f2 x * eps / (8 * f1 x * l2))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2c -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 ->...-> Rabs (l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)) < eps / 4
locally_2d_1d_const_x : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally y (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P x t)
locally_2d_singleton : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> P x y
locally_2d_1d_const_y : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P t y)
open_neq : forall y : R, open (fun u : R => u <> y)
locally_2d_locally : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y < -> locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z))
continuity_2d_pt_ext : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), (forall x0 y0 : R, f x0 y0 = g x0 y0) -> continuity_2d_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt g x y
continuity_2d_pt_filterlim : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), continuity_2d_pt f x y < -> filterlim (fun z : R * R => f (fst z) (snd z)) (locally (x, y)) (locally (f x y))
continuity_pt_locally_ext : forall (f g : R -> R) (a x : R), 0 < a -> (forall y : R, R_dist y x < a -> f y = g y) -> continuity_pt f x -> continuity_pt g x
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
locally_locally : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x P -> locally x (fun y : ?T => locally y P) where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
D_x = fun (D : R -> Prop) (y x : R) => D x /\ y <> x : (R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
R_dist = fun x y : R => Rabs (x - y) : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
locally = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
filterdiff = fun (K : AbsRing) (U V : NormedModule K) (f : U -> V) (F : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) (l : U -> V) => is_linear l /\ (forall x : U, is_filter_lim F x -> Equiv.is_domin F (fun y : U => minus y x) (fun y : U => minus (minus (f y) (f x)) (l (minus y x)))) : forall (K : AbsRing) (U V : NormedModule K), (U -> V) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> V) -> Prop Arguments K, U, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ _ function_scope function_scope function_scope]
locally_ex_dec : forall (x : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), (forall x0 : ?T, P x0 \/ ~ P x0) -> locally x P -> {d : posreal | forall y : ?T, ball x d y -> P y} where ?T : [ |- UniformSpace]
is_filter_lim_locally_unique : forall x y : ?V, is_filter_lim (locally x) y -> x = y where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
derivable_pt_inv : forall (f : R -> R) (x : R), f x <> 0 -> derivable_pt f x -> derivable_pt (/ f) x
AlembertC3_step2 : forall (An : nat -> R) (x : R), x = 0 -> {l : R | Pser An x l}
AlembertC3_step1 : forall (An : nat -> R) (x : R), x <> 0 -> (forall n : nat, An n <> 0) -> Un_cv (fun n : nat => Rabs (An (S n) / An n)) 0 -> {l : R | Pser An x l}
constant_D_eq = fun (f : R -> R) (D : R -> Prop) (c : R) => forall x : R, D x -> f x = c : (R -> R) -> (R -> Prop) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope R_scope]
minus = fun (G : AbelianGroup) (x y : G) => plus x (opp y) : forall G : AbelianGroup, G -> G -> G Argument G is implicit and maximally inserted
Pser = fun (An : nat -> R) (x l : R) => infinite_sum (fun n : nat => An n * x ^ n) l : (nat -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]

```coq
intros f1 f2 x y lx ly H1 H2 H3 eps.
apply locally_2d_and; apply locally_2d_impl with (fun u v => Rabs (f1 u v - f2 u v) <= Rabs (f1 x y - f2 x y)).
- intros u v H4. rewrite <- H2. apply H1.
- apply H3.
Qed.
```
